title: How do I forward a message or send a message to multiple recipients?
answer: To forward a message: Touch and hold the message, choose Forward from the displayed option menu, enter a recipient, and send the message. To send a message to multiple recipients: Create a message, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=64078), select the desired recipients, and touch Add. [[You can send a text message to up to 100 recipients at a time.]()]()
